profile_positions.description:
Contracted by SIEP and GP. System One, later Business OnE, was web-based portfolio management and funnel management system holding the data for project ranking and planning for the top 50 capital projects in Shell. System changes were required on a yearly basis to reflect updated requirements for project ranking and planning calculations. 
Achieved alignment between EPB and GP in the decision-making process by flagging and documenting gaps or conflicting requirements, facilitating meetings and guiding to decision making in order to obtain a good set of requirements. For the yearly update cycle in 2006 I was physically based in India for 4 weeks and managed the delivery to be on time and within budget. 
Successfully outsourced L1, L2 and L3 technical support and hosting to WIPRO: hiring the right resources, embedding Shell ITIL processes and controls.
